content: this cute chanterelle mushroom ornament is knit in dk weight scrap yarn on 4mm needles either double pointed or magic loop the finished ornament without filling in the stem weighs approximately 8g the written instructions are very basic as i wrote these while improvising this for my brother-in-law but thought it was too cute not to share so if you have any questions please send me a message i also included photos of how to pull through the co edge to make the loop and give the mushroom it s signature shape enjoy
